item.title: Images
item.description: Use markdown to display an image. ![Alt text](/images/image-1.jpg "Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash") Result: You can use figure shortcode to insert an image with caption. Example code: &#123;{< figure src="/images/image-1.jpg" title="Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash" >}&#125; Result: Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash You can add lightbox="true" parameter to use lightbox plugin. Example code: &#123;{< figure src="/images/image-1.jpg" title="Photo by Ales Krivec on Unsplash" lightbox="true" >}&#125; Result (click on the image):
